tool_description: An API shows the latest news regarding climate crisis
name: Global-ClimateChange-News
title: Global-ClimateChange-News

api_list.name: Get climate news from an  Individual Source News
api_list.description: Get climate news from an  Individual Source News
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-climatechange-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/times"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-climatechange-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-climatechange-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-climatechange-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
